name: react-express-starter
description: A starter pack for React with Express and NodeJS

scripts.install: npm i react react-dom && npm i -D webpack webpack-cli webpack-dev-server cross-env webpack-manifest-plugin sass-loader postcss-loader node-sass mini-css-extract-plugin html-webpack-plugin cssnano css-loader clean-webpack-plugin babel-loader autoprefixer @babel/preset-react @babel/preset-env @babel/core @babel/cli
scripts.prod: npm run server-prod && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --mode=production
scripts.watch: npm run dev && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack-dev-server --mode=development  --hot --progress --colors --inline

author: Fred Gauthier
